title: Thank you Riot for giving my the ability to be nyan cat

replies.body:
"Yuumi's WR is low because of numbers issues and people learning her!"

(Yuumi players sweating for just repeatedly recalling then running around w/ Homeguard after 20 minutes)

> [{quoted}](name=Reckless Anubis,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WPn6NeWz,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-05-18T04:41:54.586+0000)
>
> wait how?

There's a summoner icon, the one I'm using right now, in the shop for 1BE, it makes rainbows!
Thank you for sharing this incredibly valuable information
